package.name: blackened
package.description: An Adium chat style theme from the Adiumxtras site.
package.long: Author: "I'm working on a theme that will give me a Twitter suitable interface. This is very much a work in progress, but I'm uploading this version now to get your opinions and possible bug reports. Features included in this release: Zooming profile images. Look 'n feel inspired by Tweetie on the Iphone." This theme is available at http://www.adiumxtras.com/index.php?a=xtras&xtra_id=6557
